text: Joseph L. "Zastrow" Simms (May 1940 April 2013) was an American civil rights activist in Annapolis, Maryland. His life was the subject of a 2006 documentary entitled "Pip & Zastrow." == Awards == In January 1997, Simms received the Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Peacemaker Award. == References == Category:1940 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American civil rights activists
title: Zastrow Simms
